presentation.title: Frontend Developer
presentation.description: I am a Drontend developer. Actually working with React and learning news web frameworks such as Next.js and Node.js. I have experience developing projects with HTML, Css and Scss.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: Hello, I'm Ignacio Tomás Floría, I'm a Frontend developer and I love creating and developing new and challenging projects that allow me to continue learning and growing as a professional. I started programming a few years ago, when I graduated from high school and decided to study a higher degree in Computer Networks. There, I learned the basics of web programming with HTML and CSS. Since then, thanks to a colleague and good friend, who taught me almost everything I know about web programming, I have been specializing in various web programming languages. I have been able to participate in various projects in my first job as a web developer, ranging from a mobile application to make reservations for paddle tennis courts to an Intranet.
about.paragraph2: In these few years as a web developer, I have been able to learn and work with different web programming languages.

contact.title: Contact Me

error.serevr: Something went wrong, try again later

contact.description: Send me a message with any doubt you may have about my profile or experience. You can also use the form to send me any offer. I check my email daily and I usually answer immediately, so it will not take long to receive an answer from me.
